itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the latest news including Florida Representative Matt Gaetz being accused of dating a 17-year-old and sex trafficking, the immigration crisis at the U.S.-Mexico border, and parts of California giving Universal Basic Income to poor families so long as they aren’t white — plus Dan explains the evil history of the Associated Press.
